SEARCH
Package org.example.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
org.example.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewGUI, ViewTUI
public abstract class View extends Object
Abstract class representing the view component in the MVC architecture. Handles the interpretation of commands, management of game state, and UI updates.
